stillbach.name: Stillbrook
stillbach.description: You stand at the entrance of the village Stillbrook. A path stretches before you, winding between some rustic houses.

stillbach_road.name: Gravel Road
stillbach_road.description: You find yourself on a gravel road that meanders through the village. It ends at a central square with a fountain.

stillbach_blacksmith.name: Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith.description: Before you stands the blacksmith of Stillbrook. The warm sound of hammering metal reaches your ears.

stillbach_blacksmith_groundfloor.name: Ground Floor of the Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith_groundfloor.description: A crackling fire burns in the hearth as the anvil stands ready for metalwork.

stillbach_blacksmith_firstfloor.name: First Floor of the Blacksmith
stillbach_blacksmith_firstfloor.description: You are on the first floor of the blacksmith. Shelves are arranged with tools and pieces of metal.

stillbach_wellplace.name: Well Place
stillbach_wellplace.description: You stand on the picturesque well place. An old well adorns the center, and the trickling water creates a soothing atmosphere.

commands.move_selection_title: Where would you like to travel?
commands.talk_selection_title: Whom would you like to talk to?
commands.talk_alone: You look around, but there doesn't seem to be anyone here to talk to.
commands.talk_nobody: The onlookers cast fleeting glances at you and don't seem talkative.
commands.talk_not_good: Your instinct tells you it might be better not to talk to this person.
commands.grab_selection_title: Which item would you like to pick up?
